attributes.action: Make taking a GCSE in a registered club possible.
attributes.background: Options for taking GCSE's are very limited nationally. Many students are annoyed at being restricted to only three options because GCSE's means open even more horizons and look great on your CV. We aim to widen those options by letting registered clubs or groups lead GCSE's in the topic.

rejection.details: We're not sure what they mean by a registered club. Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
